verbs.description: [V: Has] anyone noticed that when Obama was president the right wing and even mainstream media acted as if he had no power at all . If he issued an executive order , he was an imperial president . Trump issues all kinds of orders and no one says anything ....

Has [ARG0: anyone] [V: noticed] [ARG1: that when Obama was president the right wing and even mainstream media acted as if he had no power at all . If he issued an executive order , he was an imperial president . Trump issues all kinds of orders and no one says anything] ....
